Don\'t have an account? Sign Up

Tejas Kale is currently pursuing a Bachelor\'s degree in Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) and is in the 3rd year of his studies. With a passion for technology, Tejas has acquired knowledge and skills in various domains, including web development, Android app development, operating system optimizations, UI/UX design, and much more. He is dedicated to learning and exploring new technologies to stay at the forefront of the rapidly evolving tech industry.

Sahay is your personalized AI assistant designed to make your life easier. Powered by advanced machine learning algorithms, Assistest You can help you with a wide range of tasks, from setting reminders to answering questions and providing recommendations. Our mission is to provide seamless assistance to our users, empowering them to accomplish more in less time. With Gemini, you have a reliable companion that\'s always ready to help.
This Privacy Policy describes how Assist (we, us, or our) collects, uses, and discloses your information when you use our mobile application (the Assist You).
We may collect the following information when you use the App:
We may use the information we collect for the following purposes:
To provide and maintain the App
To improve and personalize the App experience
We may share your information in the following circumstances:
With third-party service providers for app functionality and services
For legal compliance, enforcement, and protection purposes
You have the following privacy rights:
Right to access and update your personal information
Right to request deletion of your personal information
